scripts.dev: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r src/assets/* dist/assets/ && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./src/input.css -o ./dist/output.css --watch
scripts.build: npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./src/input.css -o ./dist/output.css --minify && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r src/assets/* dist/assets/ && cp src/index.html dist/index.html
